sentences.sContent: Divers discovered the wreck of an old German warship.
sentences.sCn: 潜水员发现了一艘沉没的德国旧军舰。

sentences.sContent: Injury threatened to wreck his sporting career.
sentences.sCn: 伤病可能会毁了他的运动生涯。

exam.question: The strong storm did a lot of damage to the coastal villages: several fishing boats were _______ and many houses collapsed.

answer.explain: 句意： 强风给海边的村庄造成巨大损失， 几艘渔船被毁坏， 许多房屋倒塌。 spoil： 损坏； 宠爱， 溺爱； tear： 撕， 撕裂； injure： 伤害。

synos.tran: 破坏；[水运]失事；残骸；失去健康的人

words.tran: 失事的（船）；迷幻的，兴奋的
（失事船或飞机等的）残骸；（船只等的）失事
使船失事的人，肇事者；失事现场清理人；打捞船
失事，遇难；遇难船；营救难船

trans.tranOther: to completely spoil something so that it cannot continue in a successful way
